name: Queue Conquest
description:
A game about waiting in line, but in this case you have a handy dart gun to mark those who don't play by the rules. Those who are marked one-too-many times are forcibly ejected from the line.

...but what's to stop one from abusing the system?

Prototype for "An Ordinary Game Jam" run by the Colorado Independent Game Developers Association.

Gameplay:

WASD or arrow keys move the player. Mouse click fires a dart.

Make it off the right side to win. Anyone hit 6 times will be forcibly removed (including you!).

Credits:

Character sprite adapted from https://gumroad.com/mnrart

Background from https://untappedcities.com/2017/04/24/how-buffalos-central-terminal-train-statio...

"!" Icon from the Faenza icon set.
